text: Gideon Johann van der Merwe (born ) is a South African rugby union player for in the Currie Cup and the Rugby Challenge. His regular position is flank. He made his Currie Cup debut for Griquas in July 2019, starting their opening match of the 2019 season against the at flank. ==References== Category:South African rugby union players Category:Living people Category:1995 births Category:People from Potchefstroom Category:Rugby union flankers Category:Griquas rugby union players Category:Leopards (rugby team) players
title: Gideon van der Merwe
